manifest.ext.name: String-LE
manifest.ext.desc: Extract strings from JSON, YAML, CSV (+ streaming), TOML, INI, and .ENV
manifest.command.extract.title: Extract
manifest.command.dedupe.title: Dedupe
manifest.command.sort.title: Sort
manifest.command.settings.title: Settings
manifest.command.help.title: Troubleshooting
manifest.settings.title: String-LE
manifest.settings.copy.clipboard.desc: Copy results to the clipboard automatically. Disabled for CSV.
manifest.settings.csv.streaming.desc: CSV only. Stream results incrementally. Disabled by default.
manifest.settings.open.new-file.desc: Open post-processing results in a new editor instead of replacing the file.
manifest.settings.open.side-by-side.desc: Open extraction results in a new editor to the side instead of replacing the current editor.
manifest.settings.safety.enabled.desc: Enable safety checks for large files, outputs, and document splits.
Warn if file size exceeds this threshold.
manifest.settings.safety.warn.large-outp: Warn if output lines exceed this threshold.
manifest.settings.safety.warn.many-docum: Warn if output documents exceed this threshold.
manifest.settings.parse-errors.desc: Show error messages if parsing fails.
manifest.settings.sort.mode.desc: Select sorting method for extracted strings.
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: Show a status bar item with quick status messages and one-click run.
manifest.settings.telemetry.desc: Enable local-only telemetry (no network). Logs to the 'String-LE' Output Channel.
manifest.capability.untrusted-workspaces: Extraction runs locally and never executes external tools.
runtime.message.warn.large-file: Large file detected ({0} bytes). Extraction may take longer.
runtime.dialog.many-docs.message: Many results — opening {0} documents (~{1} total lines). Proceed?
runtime.progress.extract.title: Extracting...
runtime.csv.picker.placeholder: Select a CSV column or all columns
runtime.csv.input.prompt: Enter column indexes (comma-separated), or leave empty for all columns
runtime.csv.input.validation: Enter valid column indexes separated by commas, or leave empty
runtime.csv.error.out-of-range: Column index out of range ({0}). Using all columns instead
runtime.codeaction.extract.title: Extract strings
runtime.help.title: Troubleshooting
runtime.info.multiline-detected: Multi-line strings detected. Line breaks may render differently across formats.
runtime.info.csv-no-clipboard: CSV results not auto-copied when streaming or extracting all columns.
runtime.info.postprocess-semantics: Sort and dedupe operations apply to extracted strings
runtime.warn.multiline-instability: Multi-line strings may merge or split unexpectedly.
runtime.prompt.multiline-review.title: Multi-line strings detected
runtime.prompt.large-output.title: Large output detected
runtime.prompt.large-output.body: Found {0} strings. How would you like to proceed?
runtime.note.postprocess-footnote: Note: Sort and dedupe operations apply to the extracted string list.
manifest.command.trim.title: Trim Whitespace
